content:
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/http.html#read says:

Servers SHOULD define a Resource.meta.tag with the SUBSETTED as a Simple Tag to explicitly mark such resources.

But I cannot find a definition of "Simple Tag".

What's used in practice is:

{
    "system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue",
    "code": "SUBSETTED",
    "display": "Resource encoded in summary mode"
}
yes I don't know what "simple' means in that sentence either
It threw me -- I thought something had changed while I wasn't looking :)
that happens all the time but not this time
I note that the validator doesn't pay attention to this tag (eg to soften Error - missing element into Warning - missing element)
